name: VR Holo Park: xRPD-3000
description:
Are you wondering how hard can be to fly with hand-held thrusters (like Iron Man use)? Now you can find out if you play with our demo.

Try out the xRPD-3000 hand-held thrusters and complete this test chambers with them.

In this VR demo you can fly and fight so it could be a really cool experience but this is not for everybody, if you are not comfortable with intense VR games or easily get dizzy maybe it will be an unpleasant experience for you, so please keep that in mind.

This game requires SteamVR compatible device to play (like HTC Vive, Oculus Rift/Rift S, Valve Index, Windows Mixed Reality, etc.).

VR Holo Park project
This demo is only the first piece of our upcoming futuristic VR theme park project where you will be able to experience similar cool and sometimes unusual or imaginary technologies and games from the past and the future.

If we have piqued your interest and would like to get updates and news about this project follow us on our website: https://tech-tro.com/
If you played our demo please give us feedback on our Discord server (you can also join for future updates) https://discord.gg/W9RXnUt
